Nightstrike:

Nightstrike continued shaking and shouting insults, trying to free 
himself, while Alpha followed sadly Epyon. Khonkolor "Very deep 
inside him exist our fellow..."

"SHUT UP TOM-CAT IF YOU DON'T LIKE LOOSE ALL YOUR LIVES... AND I'M 
NOT YOU FELLOW!!!!"roared Nightstrike while he continued moving 
trying to free himself

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "warriorazure" <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> AzureBlade: Alright. I will do what I can, but I will not be able 
to 
> force him back on our side unless a part of him wishes to.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::Prowl/Hot Rod/Epyon/Skyburst::
> > 
> > When Nighstrike refused to walk, Hot Rod picked him up by the 
arms, 
> and
> > Skyburst got him by the legs. The continued on, carrying him to 
the
> > cell.
> > 
> > Prowl looked to Azure.
> > "We'll have him sedated. I'm sure our medical facilities will have
> > something to do that. We'll have to keep him in a cell behind a 
> force
> > field, however. But there is a place you could work on him in 
> there."
> > Prowl then followed Hot Rod and Skyburst.
> > 
> > Epyon followed also. He wanted to see this through to the end. He 
> still
> > felt it his fault, that Nighstrike existed. He didn't go after 
> Condor
> > soon enough.
